title: Locus Specific Database (LSDB)
description: An LSDB object holds one or more data submissions based around either individuals, their phenotypes, and their variants, or a summary submission of just variant data.

Contact.description: A contact person, containing a name and other contact information.

role.description: The role of this contact person, like submitter or data owner.

name.description: The name of the contact person.

address.description: The address of the contact person.

phone.description: The phone number of the contact person.

email.description: The email address of the contact person.

Source.description: Contains information on the data source. Typically specifies the source database, although the system, organization, or institution from which the data has been exported can also be used.

name.description: The name of the data source.
